lw3dge.graphics.textures

Class ModelTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.textures.ModelTexture

  • public class ModelTexture
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a pointer to a loaded Texture, as well as minor generic texture characteristics.
    Author:
    Jared Massa

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float reflectivity
      A float to represent the reflectivity of this object (in use for specular lighting).
      float shineDamper
      A float used in the shader to determine the factor of reflected light that should be absorbed by a camera view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelTexture(int id)
      Create a new ModelTexture with a given Texture pointer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTextureID()
      Get the Pointer to the Texture this object is referencing

    • Field Detail

      • shineDamper

        public float shineDamper
        A float used in the shader to determine the factor of reflected light that should be absorbed by a camera view.

      • reflectivity

        public float reflectivity
        A float to represent the reflectivity of this object (in use for specular lighting).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelTexture

        public ModelTexture(int id)
        Create a new ModelTexture with a given Texture pointer
